Central Board of Direct Taxes (Income Tax) >> Direct Taxes >> Issues with IT Returns >> TDS Mismatch

TAN/PAN : X-X-X-X-X
Financial Year/Assessment Year : 2021-2022
Regional office / Office : DGIT(Systems) CPC, E-filing
-----------------------
We have filed our Income Tax Return for FY 2021-22 on vide Ack No X2X1X9X8X0X1X2X dated 07/10/2022. which was processed on 04/11/2022 .
In The return we have claimed TDS for our other Transferor   companies & also  offered the Income of other Transferor companies  as, A.K.S.Finstock Pvt. Ltd ( PAN-X-X-X-X-X), Ashriwad Fincap Pvt. Ltd ( PAN-X-X-X-X-X) & Shorewala & Co. Pvt Ltd ( PAN-X-X-X-X-X) , which were merged in this assessee company ( Shorewala  Investment & Properties Pvt Ltd. , PAN-X-X-X-X-X) due to NCLT order dated 01/12/2021. The copy of the NCLT Order is enclosed for your perusal 
However We have already filed for transfer of TDS in the annual return on  Assessee’s  IT portal through the feedback of AIS/ TIS of the merged Companies. But the sameTDS  has not been considered, However the offered Income has been considered , while processing made u/s 143(1)(a) of the Assessee company , hence the TDS of the merged companies credit has not been provided to the Assessee company while processing the return . Kindly inform how to claim the above transferred TDS of Rs   77067
Your early reply in the same will be highly appreciated

grievance_text:
O/o the Comptroller & Auditor General of India >> Employee/Pensioner of IA&AD >> Others

Office/Officer : AG AUDIT,TELENGANA (Telengana)
Name of the concerned : AUDIT III and HEAD OF OFFICE
-----------------------
My Husband Sri Juluri Uma Maheswara Rao was not given his Promotion of Audit Officer on 01.01.2014 only because a memo 20.12.2013 was served to him for Departmental Enquiry means the enquiry was not even started which was an unlawful act? How he was allowed to participate in AG Office, Hyderabad Society elections in 2014 which was in between the Departmental Enquiry on him? What was the Nomination date, Election date, no of staff participated in elections, how many votes were casted in elections, how many votes my Husband got, who won the election and by how many votes, what was my husbands symbol for election, who gave permission to my husband for participating in elections, when my husband was not eligible for promotion before starting of enquiry how he became eligible for contest elections which was in between enquiry? In order to save the Rights and Wishes of Reservation Staff of AG Office, Hyderabad the elections was being conducted in 2014? If my Husband could have won the elections then was it a strategy to cancel the elections held showing the enquiry pending and not allow a Brahmin staff to be president of the Society and make their reservation staff the president at any cost? Provide me the nomination form, symbol allotted to my husband, ballet paper of election conducted with list of participants and their allotted symbols, my husbands promises list, how much amount was paid by my husband for contesting in election as fee etc? How many Police were made for security for election and from which station they came from and who wrote letter to police for such request? Will AG Office, Hyderabad cancel the elections conducted in 2014 as they known the fraud act of making my husband participate in election and cancel all the works done by the elected president and recover the money spent by him in his term and what will be the escaping strategy of AG Office, Hyderabad now to cover this act performed and who will be made a victim for safety to escape?

PAN No. : XkXpX4X2Xe
Assessment Year : 2022-2023
Charge/Office  : Not Provided
Regional office / Office : Region Karnataka & Goa
-----------------------
i registered my grivences under Reg. No. XBXDX/X/X0X2X4X0X7 on 4/12/2022 . My case was closed on 28/12/2022 with a remark "capital gain has been verified and rectified  u/s 154 resulting into  refund of Rs. 6255/-  which was credited to my A/C on 30/12/2022. The case was related to AY 2019-2020.The capital gain was erroneously taken double the actual amt. by CPC Bengaluru. Since the demand was raised for Rs 50482/- the refund of Rs. 11102/-  for the AY 2022-2023 was adjusted and was not paid. Since there is no demand  for AY 2019-2020  now the refund of Rs.11102/-  for the AY 2022-2023 is due to me .

Dear Sir/ Madam,

This is in reference to application filed with Ld. AO, DCIT Circle 7(1), Delhi for giving effect to order passed by ITAT  in case of assessee, Federal Mogul TPR  India Limited (formerly known as Goetze TP India Limited) for AY 2012-12. grievance_text:
Central Board of Excise and Customs >> Indirect Taxes Related >> Customs >> Incorrect custom duty levied

State : west bengal
Jurisdiction of the complainant (Zone) : Not Provided
Port Code : Not Provided
IEC Code : Not Provided
BE/ SB No : Not Provided
Region : Kolkata ZONE (Custom)
-----------------------
Good morning
Hope you are having a fantastic day. I would like to lodge a complaint against the Kolkata customs department for their unprofessional behaviour. My personal parcel arriving from Saudi Arabia was held at the Kolkata customs department and levied a fifty sum of 30000, the reasons for which are clearly unknown. No form of communication is possible with them as they never pick up phone calls, reply to the emails, respond to tweets.

The package is worth 300 saudi riyals and contains dates, chocolates, atta and biscuits weighing 30 kgs. I still don't get why a package containing food items will be contained for 2 months without any clarification. Even if there were any issues , we were to be informed but that didn't happen unfortunately.

2 months is enough for perishable items to rot in the box, the condition in which they will be lying is also not hard to guess. For this inconvenience I would like to ask for an remuneration of equal amount in INR which is approximately 6,582 rupee. I understand the hustle bustle of a government department but that in no way means that a case should go unattended. 

One more thing - the numbers available on the official page to contact kolkata customs department are either invalid or never received by anyone.

consignment number: X-X-X-X-X
